title: Natural Language Processing (NLP) & Text Mining Tutorial | Machine Learning Tutorial | Simplilearn
excerpt: The Natural Language Processing video gives you a detailed look at the science of applying machine learning algorithms to process large amounts of natural language data. NLP is driving the growth of the AI market, and this video helps you develop the skills required to get started with NLP & text mining.
